A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The sad thing is Ep 9 is supposed to close out all 9 movies. It's supposed to be an all out conclusion to the Star Wars we know before beginning the next (unrelated) trilogy. Ep 7 the way it is should have never happened. Ep 7 should have been the beginning of the 3 part conclusion to Star Wars. It could have been so much better. Like I saw on another video they could bring back everyone on the light side to battle Snoke. Anakin (who could possibly turn Kylo back to the light)\, Obi Wan\, Yoda Qui-Gon\, and many others in Ep 9 closing out what could have been the ultimate ending to a great story. I can't see how they can do anything dealing with an ending worth what the original trilogy and prequels deserve. I wish they could wipe these last two films from the story and begin again at Ep. 7. Made for the fans without agendas that trump story. It's all around disappointing.
